block.p: ABN AMRO INC., -- Chicago, has named John K. Martin Jr., vice president of investor relations for Time Warner, as director of ABN AMRO's equity research team in New York.
ABN AMRO INC., -- Chicago, has named John K. Martin Jr., vice president of investor relations for Time Warner, as director of ABN AMRO's equity research team in New York.

BENEFITPORT, -- Greenwich, Conn., a health insurance sales and employee benefit network, named Thomas P. Staudt, senior operating officer for Healtheon/WebMD, as chief executive. He succeeds Andrew Sawyer, who will serve as president of the insurance division.

TURNER BROADCASTING SYSTEM INTERNATIONAL, -- London and New York, has named David Levy and Andrew Bird as co-presidents. They will assume the duties of Philip I. Kent, who was named president and chief operating officer of CNN News Group. Nan Richards, president of TBS Europe News Networks, was named president of TBS Europe Ltd.
